name: Rudolph Community and Care LLC
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Rudolph Community and Care LLC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Elko, MN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $5.9M in Medicaid payments across 4K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $5.9M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
